attributes.action: put in place more access courses for students who come from deprived backgorunds, especially for more competitive careers. This includes students who are unable to get the grades required for a aprticular course. There needs to be courses in place to allow students who have the passion but not the acedemic abilty to achieve their potential.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petetion should be signed by everyone who is going through the UCAS procedure, those who have gone through it and those who have children that will embark upon this journey. We need to do something about the this, as we all deserve a place in careers such as medicine, where the acedemic requirements are so high. There are people out there from backgrounds, who may not get a chance to do a course like medicine and an access course can give them this opportunity.
